dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SIN IS IMPRISONMENT / GRACE IS LIBERATION

kernfrasen: I do not know the way
good works that God has prepared for you to walk in

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The enemy held my will, and he made a chain of it and bound me by it—by my own iron will.

doeldomein.theologisch_concept: Total Depravity / Bondage of the Will

cognitieve_implicaties: The individual is not in control of their own movement
External intervention is required for movement
theologische_implicaties: Monergism: only God can break the chain
Sin is an ontological state, not just a series of bad choices
ethische_implicaties: Humility regarding one's own moral strength
Reliance on divine grace for behavioral change

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the dead metaphor of 'bondage' by using Augustine's vivid 'iron chain' imagery and connecting it to modern psychological 'unconscious' forces.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher uses the 'Ring' from Tolkien as a central conceptual anchor that bridges the gap between the Juridical (Law/Bondage) and Military (Warfare/Power) domains. The Ring functions as a 'Container' of evil that exerts 'Force' on the 'Will'.

incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: GOD IS ARCHITECT (Walking in prepared works)
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: Freedom usually entails open paths, but the sermon suggests freedom is found in following a pre-determined track.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Paradoxical identification: The preacher argues that being 'bound' to God's will is the only true 'freedom' from the 'chain' of sin.

sterktes.beschrijving: Uses the 'Ring of Power' to make the abstract concept of 'Original Sin' concrete and terrifyingly tangible.
sterktes.voorbeeld: It is not Gollum, Frodo, but the Ring itself that decided things.

risicos.beschrijving: By mapping sin to an external 'fierce eager will' or a 'Ring', the hearer might view sin as something that happens to them rather than something they do.
risicos.voorbeeld: He had no will left in the matter.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants may feel excused from moral effort.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The world of Middle-earth (Mount Doom, Rivendell, the Ring).
sub_worlds: The 4th Century North Africa of Augustine
The political stage of Bob Dole

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Reinforced through the concept of 'Predestination' as a 'sweet comfort'.

verstoorde_schemas.schema_naam: The American Gospel of Free Will
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Freedom as Alignment with Divine Purpose.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligned with the Book of Common Prayer and the Thirty-Nine Articles.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the 'FORCE' and 'BONDAGE' schemas. It successfully moves the hearer from a 'Transactional' view of faith (I choose God, God rewards me) to a 'Transformational/Sovereign' view (God chooses me, I am liberated). The use of pop-culture mythology (Tolkien) serves as a powerful bridge for the abstract Pauline theology.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Use the 'Mirror of Galadriel' imagery to explain how God's grace allows us to see our true place in His 'great history'.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: Seeing yourself not as a random actor, but as a character in a 'Divine Design'.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition from 'no will' to 'doing great things' (visiting prisons, etc.).
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly use the 'Empowerment' metaphor: God's will is the 'fuel' or 'wind' that enables the previously 'chained' ship to move.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: The Ring is an external object; sin is an internal corruption.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify that the Ring 'corrupts from within' to maintain the target domain's focus on the heart.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To balance the 'Military' force with 'Healing' for those who feel crushed by the 'Iron Will'.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using narrative source domains to explain complex systematic theology. The CMT mapping is robust and emotionally resonant.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the Tolkien references as 'creative,' CMT reveals they are 'cognitive' tools for understanding the mechanics of the will.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's experiential learning cycle, CMT focuses on the 'pre-reflective' structures of how the hearer perceives God's power.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher is systematically replacing the 'MARKET/CHOICE' schema with a 'SOVEREIGN/VOCATION' schema.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: human heart in conflict with itself
pull ourselves out of a swamp by our own hair
appendices.notities: Sermon effectively uses 'Schema Disruption' regarding the American concept of Free Will.
